name: Beating Up Thieves
description:
In the game, a thief steals your car when you don't notice it.
There are a lot of ways to catch him in the scene. Now let's try to get it back!

Game features:
1.Pure hand drawn animation.
2.The has very crazy cartoon style, which is the same as that of the Whack Your Boss and Computer series.
3.Total of 10 animations, You can find the hidden animation in the end.
